channel.title: How do i set my scar script file to my charter?
channel.description:
:confused: tell me or die :cool: that aint cool. ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:21:07 PM[/size][hr]any one? [br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:24:36 PM[/size][hr]this is what my scar is saying-program script;
const banksymbol = 5825779; //Green part of $ sign yewtree = 1282831; //middle of yew tree on minimap roadcolor = 5921634; //road color on minimap Message1='hello world'; procedure hello; wait(1000) begin Writeln(Message1); // this says hello world! end; {.include SRL/SRL/Extended/xInventory.scar} banksymbol = 5825779; //Green part of $ sign yewtree = 1282831; //middle of yew tree on minimap roadcolor = 5921634; //road color on minimap begin repeat[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:34:27 PM[/size][hr]ne one? :|

item.title: How do i set my scar script file to my charter?
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

What’s your question? Are you trying to write your own script or get someone elses to work for you?(if its the second youre in the wrong forum so go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,12.0.html.) Either way I don’t know what you’re asking.

item.source: How do i set my scar script file to my charter?

item.title: How do i set my scar script file to my charter?
item.dc:creator: @goku_genuis goku_genuis
item.description:
@goku_genuis wrote:

tell me or die that aint cool. ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:21:07 PM[/size][hr]any one?
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:24:36 PM[/size][hr]this is what my scar is saying-program script;

const
banksymbol = 5825779; //Green part of $ sign
yewtree = 1282831; //middle of yew tree on minimap
roadcolor = 5921634; //road color on minimap
Message1=‘hello world’;
procedure hello;
wait(1000)
begin
Writeln(Message1); // this says hello world!
end;
{.include SRL/SRL/Extended/xInventory.scar}
banksymbol = 5825779; //Green part of $ sign
yewtree = 1282831; //middle of yew tree on minimap
roadcolor = 5921634; //road color on minimap
begin
repeat[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:34:27 PM[/size][hr]ne one?

Read full topic
